Description: Message for an in-hand description or if you have any questions! Luthier Certified PerformanceWillcutt Guitars is proud to introduce its "Luthier Certified Performance" program. Why would you buy anything from an auction site or worn out merchandise when you can save money and have something "Luthier Certified"! To qualify, only the very best preowned or demo models are chosen. They are sent through our factory authorized luthier shop where they are given a full $100+ value total set up and are packed professionally for safe transit to your door. Fingerboards are oiled (unless maple) with Fret Doctor and buffed to a high luster which also melts the oil deep into the wood. Frets are checked for high spots and buzzing and the frets are polished. (A level and crown would be extra) Tuning keys, truss rod, nut height, bridge height, intonation, and pickups are adjusted for maximum playability. Pots and switches are tightened and cleaned for maximum performance. New strings are not only properly installed, but stretched and tested for stability. The body is buffed and cleaned to help minimize any scratches or playing wear. These instruments carry a one year Willcutt Warranty on all parts and labor, excluding strings. Shipping charges for these issues are not covered, but we make every effort to keep them as low as possible. DescriptionUSED Suhr Pro Series Black Satin Modern in stock! Great playing, no frills tone machine. In excellent condition, includes paperwork and deluxe gig bag. There are many reasons to love African Mahogany - it is beautiful, it sounds great, and is lightweight. The Modern Satin was created to celebrate the sound and beauty of this tonewood. These guitars feature a satin finish which displays the natural grain of the African Mahogany. The thin layer of satin finish also allows the neck and body to resonate freely, producing warm, lively tones that project loud and clear. These choice tonewoods work in harmony with our JST pickups to produce a wide array of tones. Lightweight African Mahogany BodyAfrican Mahogany NeckIndian Rosewood FretboardModern Elliptical (.800 -.850)14'' RadiusJumbo Stainless Steel Frets1.650" Nut WidthGotoh 510 BridgeSuhr® Locking TunersVolume / Tone / 5-Way SwitchJST SSV Humbucker Pickup (Neck)JST SSH+ Humbucker Pickup (Bridge)Black Satin FinishDeluxe Gig Bag Casesn JST6T0H6 lbs. 7 oz. Why Buy from Willcutt Guitars Willcutt Guitars has been in business since 1968 in Lexington, Kentucky. Owned by Bob Willcutt; a Master Luthier and Author, we offer a huge selection of guitars, amplifiers, and guitar accessories. Buying from us assures you quality products, professional setup, fast shipping and friendly service. Please message if you have any questions! All of our guitars receive a FREE setup (normally $100) by our Master Luthier and Owner Bob Willcutt. Shipping Items usually ship the same day if ordered and paid for by 1 PM EST Monday through Friday. If the item is paid for after 1 PM EST Monday through Friday or Saturday or Sunday it will ship the following business day. All shipments will be made using UPS Ground. We can ship to a PO Box, but additional shipping charges may apply. Free shipping is to lower 48 only. Customers in Alaska, Hawaii, or the US protectorate please contact us for shipping quotes. All shipments valued over $250 will require a signature upon delivery. Payment PayPal PayPal requires us to ship to the address on the transaction and the address must be confirmed. We cannot ship to a different address that is not on the PayPal account. Credit Cards We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover. _gsrx_vers_827 (GS 7.0.13 (827))
